name: Carnivorous Sod
senses: blindsight 30 ft., tremorsense 60 ft., passive Perception 10

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Grass Trip
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: The target is knocked prone.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While the carnivorous sod remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal patch of grass.

special_abilities.name: Spell Eater
special_abilities.desc: If the carnivorous sod is in an area targeted by a spell that enhances plants in that area, such as the entangle, plant growth, and spike growth spells, the carnivorous sod absorbs the spell, ending it, and gains 10 temporary hp for each level of the spell it absorbed for 1 hour.

special_abilities.name: Tripping Grass
special_abilities.desc: If the carnivorous sod didn't move on its previous turn and hits a target with its Grass Trip, it can make one attack with its bite as a bonus action.
